title: Video Exclusive: Blaenavon | Foes
body:
World renowned Director “TJ Finchie” drops the latest visual cut from pop sensation, welsh boy-band Blaenavon.

Featuring beautifully choreographed moves from local dance-troop “Shapez+Killz” and the classic indie guitar stylings of everyone’s favourite underage band: it’s sure to tear up the blogosphere.

See the stunning final edit below:
